CustomField.formula: IF( OR (ISBLANK(FFP_Expiration_Date__c), (TODAY() - FFP_Expiration_Date__c) < 0) , '', IF( TODAY() -(FFP_Expiration_Date__c ) <=7 , 'Last 7 days', IF( TODAY()-(FFP_Expiration_Date__c) <= 30, 'Last 30 days', IF( TODAY()-(FFP_Expiration_Date__c) <= 90, 'Last 90 days', IF( TODAY()-(FFP_Expiration_Date__c) <= 120, 'Last 120 days', IF( TODAY()-(FFP_Expiration_Date__c) <= 365, 'Last 365 days','More than 365 days') )))))
CustomField.label: Days Since FFP Expiration Date
